item.description:
for those who are fans of this movie, I don't have to say much: just make your way to the Criterion at ludicrous speed, and join me then for this classic flick on the big screen. when will then be now? soon.

as for any of you who haven't seen it...it's not what you think. it's much, much worse! seriously though, here's your chance. and Criterion serves beer! and, ahem, malt beverages.

pre-party at Ed's place! see calendar for details

meet in the lobby at 11:15. your contact: Ben (203) 554-5144
item.name: Fri. 9/7 - May the Schwartz be with you! Spaceballs @ Criterion Insomnia Theater
